translated: If one desires accomplishment with the vajra,

original: da lta'i sbyor ba kun shes bya //
analyzed: da lta'i sbyor ba kun shes bya //
translated: one should know the present application.

original: de nas 'dir rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis dgongs pa dpal rdo rje'i glus srid pa shin tu sgrub pa blangs pa /
analyzed: de nas 'dir rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis dgongs pa dpal rdo rje'i glus srid pa shin tu sgrub pa blangs pa /
translated: Then here the Vajrayoginƒ´s took up the existence of the accomplishment of existence with the vajra song of intention:

original: kye grogs @48b po rdo rjes padma kha 'byed sad mdzad mang a'a la la ho /
analyzed: kye grogs @48b po rdo rjes padma kha 'byed sad mdzad mang a'a la la ho /
translated: ‚ÄúKye! Friend, the vajra opens the lotus and awakens, a la la ho!‚Äù

original: bde ba chen po gar gyis rab tu mnyes mdzod cig /
analyzed: bde ba chen po gar gyis rab tu mnyes mdzod cig /
translated: Delight the great bliss with dance.

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor padma'i kha ni rab bye ba //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor padma'i kha ni rab bye ba //
translated: The sun mandala opens the lotus,

original: bde ba chen po'i gar gyis rab tu mnyes par mdzod //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i gar gyis rab tu mnyes par mdzod //
translated: delight the great bliss with dance.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la //
translated: To the great vajra holder,

original: de nas 'dir glu blangs tsam gyis //üîΩrdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams gar //
analyzed: de nas 'dir glu blangs tsam gyis // rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams gar //
translated: then here, merely by singing a song,üîΩthe vajra dakinis dance,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskul //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskul //
translated: encouraging Vajrasattva.

original: de ltar rtag tu gus ldan pas //
analyzed: de ltar rtag tu gus ldan pas //
translated: Thus, always with devotion,

original: sbyor ba'i dngos grub 'gyur ba yin //üîΩdus bzhir rab tu sbyar ba yi //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i dngos grub 'gyur ba yin // dus bzhir rab tu sbyar ba yi //
translated: the accomplishment of union will occur.üîΩThe supreme meditation that is applied

original: 'grub par 'gyur ba sgom pa'i mchog /
analyzed: 'grub par 'gyur ba sgom pa'i mchog /
translated: in the four times will be accomplished.

original: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs shing //
analyzed: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs shing //
translated: With all ornaments complete,

original: spos dang me tog rnams kyis brgyan //
analyzed: spos dang me tog rnams kyis brgyan //
translated: adorned with incense and flowers,

original: ji ltar sku gsum mchog ster ba'i //
analyzed: ji ltar sku gsum mchog ster ba'i //
translated: just as the supreme three bodies are bestowed,

original: dngos grub nges par thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: dngos grub nges par thob par 'gyur //
translated: the accomplishment will definitely be attained.

original: dpag tshad rgya yi khyon tsam du //
analyzed: dpag tshad rgya yi khyon tsam du //
translated: The size of the land of India,

original: 'di ni rab tu snang bar byed //
analyzed: 'di ni rab tu snang bar byed //
translated: this will be illuminated.

original: dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas //
analyzed: dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas //
translated: The two organs are fully applied,

original: sgo dgu las ni byung ba'i rdzas //üîΩsangs rgyas byang chub gnas zhi ba'i //
analyzed: sgo dgu las ni byung ba'i rdzas // sangs rgyas byang chub gnas zhi ba'i //
translated: The substances that arise from the nine doorsüîΩare the means of accomplishing the unsurpassed

original: de nyid bla na med pa 'grub //
analyzed: de nyid bla na med pa 'grub //
translated: in the peaceful abode of the enlightenment of the buddhas.

original: 'dir tshigs bcad du 'gyur ba ni //
analyzed: 'dir tshigs bcad du 'gyur ba ni //
translated: Here is the verse:üîΩThe various forms, the signs and seals,

original: gzugs rnams dang ni de bzhin phyag rgya mtshan ma dang // rdzas rnams dang ni bsam gtan rnam sgo ma pa'i //
analyzed: gzugs rnams dang ni de bzhin phyag rgya mtshan ma dang // rdzas rnams dang ni bsam gtan rnam sgo ma pa'i //
translated: the substances, the contemplations, the doors of the goddesses,üîΩthe various methods of ritual,

original: cho ga'i thabs ni sna tshogs bstan pa dang // lha mo yid 'dod rnams ni gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: cho ga'i thabs ni sna tshogs bstan pa dang // lha mo yid 'dod rnams ni gsungs pa'o //
translated: and the goddesses' mental desires are taught.üîΩIn the house where this tantra dwells,

original: gang gi khyim du rgyud 'di gnas pa dang // rgyun du 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / rnam par sgom pa de la nad rnams @49a *//
analyzed: gang gi khyim du rgyud 'di gnas pa dang // rgyun du 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / rnam par sgom pa de la nad rnams @49a *//
translated: is always held, read, and contemplated, diseases

original: 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: will not arise there.

original: rgas pa dang / bgegs mi 'byung la 'chi bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: rgas pa dang / bgegs mi 'byung la 'chi bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: Aging and obstacles will not occur, and death will not happen.

original: rgyun du thams cad du rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug ma rnams kyis bgegs bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyun du thams cad du rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug ma rnams kyis bgegs bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Always, everywhere, the yoginƒ´s will protect from obstacles.

original: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma chen mo rnams kyi dgongs pa mchog tu gsang ba gsang ba chen po nye bar spyod pa dang bcas pa'i sgrub thabs te le'u gsum pa'o ////
analyzed: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma chen mo rnams kyi dgongs pa mchog tu gsang ba gsang ba chen po nye bar spyod pa dang bcas pa'i sgrub thabs te le'u gsum pa'o ////
translated: The means of achieving the supreme secret of the great Vajrayoginis, together with the conduct, is the third chapter.

original: sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so ////
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so ////
translated: The Great Magical Illusion Tantra is complete.

original: rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin par dang / bod kyi lo tstsha ba chen po 'gos lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
analyzed: rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin par dang / bod kyi lo tstsha ba chen po 'gos lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
translated: The Indian preceptor Dharmashri and the great Tibetan translator-reviser, the monk Lotsawa Chokyi Gyaltsen, translated and finalized this text.
